nodes.text: The Eriadu News Service, also known as ENS, was a news service that operated on the planet Eriadu during the early years of the Galactic Empire. In 17 BBY, an ENS crew traveled to the war-torn planet Kelrodo-Ai to interview Captain Shea Hublin, an Imperial pilot from the 77th Air Wing who was leading a campaign to force holdout Separatist troops from the world, as part of the Empire's Western Reaches Operation. The ENS reporter Eris Herro spoke with Hublin and their coversation was recorded by a holocamera operator. Once their news report was complete, the News Service team departed from the world.
